main(String[]) - Static method in class WhackAMole.WhackAPaceKnight
Runs the game.
Mole - Class in WhackAMole
This class creates a JButton that acts as one "mole".
Mole() - Constructor for class WhackAMole.Mole
Constructs a "mole" button.
moleArray - Variable in class WhackAMole.MolePanel
The array that houses all of the "moles".
MoleGamePanel - Class in WhackAMole
Combines the MolePanel, Mole, and PausePanel classes into one panel that is the sole panel for the "Whack-a-mole" game.
MoleGamePanel() - Constructor for class WhackAMole.MoleGamePanel
Constructs the "Whack-a-mole" game.
MoleGamePanel.EscapeListener - Class in WhackAMole
A KeyAdapter class that listens for escape presses and quits the game when it receives one.
MolePanel - Class in WhackAMole
Class that generates the main "whack-a-mole" panel where users will click on the enemies to score points.
MolePanel() - Constructor for class WhackAMole.MolePanel
Constructs a mole panel that generates a 2D array of "mole" objects and sets them to randomly appear and disappear.
moveMole() - Method in class WhackAMole.MolePanel
Despawns every "mole" except for one, which will move around the 2D array if not clicked and will disappear if it is clicked.
mp - Static variable in class WhackAMole.MoleGamePanel
A new MolePanel object that will be in the center of the panel.
